channel.title: Need Help with some TRAPS! =D
channel.description:
Well I've created this Pk area on Kandor, and I want to make it so if you click on one of the mining rocks or plants you take a certain amount of damage while your being attacked or not attacked.
Hope someone can help. =]

item.title: Need Help with some TRAPS! =D
item.dc:creator: @hailmerrypks7 hailmerrypks7
item.description:
@hailmerrypks7 wrote:

i know how to do that just what is the variable for attacking…do i do :

Public int (i guess u could say attack) = 0

then
whenever i want something to attack ill say:

attack = 15; (15 being the amount of damage)?

item.title: Need Help with some TRAPS! =D
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

I really don’t know exactly what to do, but I know when you want to click on something and make it do something. You go into client.java file. Then you see those case ####: things you need to make one of those I don’t know what to put in it though. Mabye if you get the deltascape souce, and find the case ####: for the exploading thing when you drop it you can edit that a little and that might work.
